___show.description: Show the content area upon action request.

___onActions.description: Actions on which the content should become visible.

___visibility.description: Features regarding the visibility of the controlled widget area.

___toggleOn.description: Flags toggling the content's visibility. The content is shown if any of the flags is true, hidden otherwise.

___initially.description: Determines if the content area is visible initially (true) or not.

___flag.description: Flag published on change of the content's visibility.

___animation.description: Offer to animate changes to the visibility state.

___enabled.description: If true visibility changes are animated.

___hide.description: Hide the content are upon action request.

___onActions.description: Actions on which the content should become invisible.

___name.description: Name of the exported area used to show or hide content.

name: laxar-show-hide-widget
description: Toggles the visibility of an area upon receiving events.
